      • getListSize

        public int getListSize()
        Get the list size.
        Returns:
        The number of items to return in a recommendation list.

      • getCandidates

        Get the candidate item selector.

      • getExclude

        Get the exclude item selector.
        Returns:

      • getPrefix

        public java.lang.String getPrefix()
        Get the prefix (or null if no prefix is set) to be applied to each column label. If not null, this prefix will be added to the beginning of each column label, separated by a '.' This property might not be supported by the built metric.
        Returns:
        the prefix

      • getSuffix

        public java.lang.String getSuffix()
        Get the suffix (or null if no suffix is set) to be applied to each column label. If not null, this suffix will be added to the end of each column label, separated by a '.' This property might not be supported by the built metric.
        Returns:

      • setListSize

        public void setListSize(int n)
        Set the recommendation list size. The default size is 10.
        Parameters:
        n - The recommendation list size.

      • setCandidates

        public void setCandidates(ItemSelector sel)
        Set the candidate selector. The default is ItemSelectors.testItems().
        Parameters:
        sel - The candidate item selector.

      • setExclude

        public void setExclude(ItemSelector sel)
        Set the exclude item selector. The default is ItemSelectors.trainingItems().
        Parameters:
        sel - The exclude item selector.

      • setPrefix

        public void setPrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Set the prefix to be applied to each column label. If not null, the prefix will be added to the beginning of each column label, separated by a '.'
        Parameters:
        prefix - the prefix to apply or null to set no prefix.

      • setSuffix

        public void setSuffix(java.lang.String suffix)
        Set the suffix to be applied to each column label. If not null, the suffix will be added to the end of each column label, separated by a '.'
        Parameters:
        suffix - the suffix to apply or null to set no suffix.
